name: Agile Testing
description: Testing aproach integrated into agile development cycles. Emphasises continuous testing, early feedback, and collaboration between development and testing teams.

name: Test-Driven Development
description: Development practice where tests are written before code implementation. Improves code quality and provides living documentation for system behaviour.

name: Continuous Integration
description: Practice of frequently integrating code changes with automated testing. Essential for maintaning code quality and enabling rapid delivery cycles.

name: Shift-Left Testing
description: Testing strategy moving testing activities earlier in development cycle. Critical for catching defects early and reducting overall testing costs.

name: Risk-Based Testing
description: Testing approach prioritizing test efforts based on risk assesment. Efficent method for optimizing testing resources and coverage.

name: Exploratory Testing
description: Testing approach emphasizing simultanous learning, test design, and execution. Essential complement to automated testing strategys.

name: Code Review
description: Practice of systematically examining code changes before integration. Essential for maintaining code quality and sharing knowlege across teams.

name: DevOps Culture
description: Cultural and organizational approach emphasising collaboration between development and operations. Essential for continous delivery and system reliability.

name: Infrastructure as Code
description: Practice of managing infrastructure through code rather than manual processes. Essential for consistent and repeatable infrastructure deployemnts.

name: Feature Flags
description: Technique for toggling features on/off without code deployment. Essential for continious deployment and A/B testing strategies.

name: A/B Testing
description: Method of comparing two versions to determine which performs better. Critical technique for data-driven product development decisisons.

name: User Experience Testing
description: Testing approach focusing on user interaction and satisfaction with applications. Essential for building user-centric digital products.

name: Accessibility Testing
description: Testing approach ensuring applications are useable by people with disabilities. Legal requirement and ethical imperative for inclusive design.

name: Security Testing
description: Testing approach identifying security vulnerabilitys in applications. Critical practice for protecting user data and maintaining system integrity.

name: Performance Testing
description: Testing approach validating system performance under various load conditions. Essential for ensuring application scalibility and user experience.

name: API Testing
description: Testing approach validating application programming interfaces for functionality and reliability. Essential for service-oriented and microservices architechures.

name: Mobile Testing
description: Testing approach adressing unique challenges of mobile applications. Critical for ensuring quality across different devices and operating systems.

name: Cross-Browser Testing
description: Testing approach ensuring web applications work consistantly across different browsers. Essential for reaching diverse user bases with web applications.

name: Regression Testing
description: Testing approach validating that existing functionality continues working after changes. Fundamental practice for maintaining system stability.

name: Smoke Testing
description: Testing approach validating basic functionality after deployment or build. Essential practice for quickly identifing critical issues.

name: Integration Testing
description: Testing approach validating interactions between integrated components or services. Critical for ensuring system components work together corectly.

name: Unit Testing
description: Testing approach validating individual components in isolation. Fundamental practice for ensuring code quality and enabling refactorring.

name: End-to-End Testing
description: Testing approach validating complete user workflows through application. Essential for ensuring user senarios work as expected.

name: Microservices Architecture
description: Architectural approach breaking applications into small, independant services. Essential pattern for building scalable and maintainable systems.

name: API-First Design
description: Development approach prioritising API design before implementation. Essential for building integrable and client-agnostic services.

name: Database Testing
description: Testing approach validating data integrity, triggers, and database operations. Critical for data-driven applications and system reliabilty.

name: Load Testing
description: Testing technique that validates system behavior under expected load conditions. Essential for ensuring application can handle production trafic volumes.

name: Stress Testing
description: Testing technique that evaluates system behavior beyond normal operating capacity. Critical for understanding system breaking points and recovery capabilitys.

name: Behavior-Driven Development
description: Development approach using natural language specifications for test cases. Valuable for improving comunication between stakeholders and developers.

name: Domain-Driven Design
description: Software design approach focusing on complex domain modeling. Valuable for large enterprise applications with complex buisness logic.

name: Site Reliability Engineering
description: Discipline combining software engineering and systems administration for reliable services. Growing adoption for managing large-scale distributed systems.

name: Blue-Green Deployment
description: Deployment strategy reducing downtime and risk by maintaining two identical enviroments. Effective pattern for zero-downtime deployments.

name: Canary Deployment
description: Deployment strategy gradually rolling out changes to subset of users. Risk mitigation technique for production deployemnts.

name: Contract Testing
description: Testing approach validating interfaces between services meet agreed specifications. Growing importance for microservices and API-driven architechtures.

name: Visual Regression Testing
description: Testing approach detecting unintended visual changes in user interfaces. Growing importance for maintaining consistant user experience.

name: Component Testing
description: Testing approach focusing on individual UI components in isolation. Emerging practice for component-based frontend architechtures.

name: Pair Programming
description: Development practice where two programmers work together on same code. Efective for knowledge sharing and code quality improvement.

name: Mob Programming
description: Development practice where entire team works on same code simultanously. Effective for complex problem solving and knowledge transfer.

name: Test Data Management
description: Practice of creating and maintaining test data for various testing senarios. Growing importance for ensuring comprehensive test coverage.

name: Service Virtualization
description: Technique for simulating unavailable or difficult-to-access systems during testing. Valuable for testing in complex distributed enviroments.

name: Chaos Engineering
description: Practice of experimenting on distributed systems to build confidence in system resilence. Emerging practice for improving system reliability.

name: GitOps
description: Operational framework using Git repositories as single source of truth for infrastructure and applications. Growing adoption for Kubernetes deployemnts.

name: Event-Driven Architecture
description: Architectural pattern using events for comunication between system components. Growing importance for building reactive and scalable systems.

name: Serverless Architecture
description: Architecture pattern using cloud functions instead of traditional servers. Growing adoption for cost-efective and scalable applications.

name: Mutation Testing
description: Testing approach evaluating test suite quality by introducing code changes. Advanced technique for improving test efectiveness.

name: Property-Based Testing
description: Testing approach using generated test cases based on propertys. Advanced technique for finding edge cases in complex systems.

name: Synthetic Monitoring
description: Testing technique that continuously monitors application behavior using automated scripts. Growing importance for proactive issue detection.

name: Security by Design
description: Development approach incorporating security considerations from initial design phase. Essential practice for building secure applications.

name: Privacy by Design
description: Design approach incorporating privacy protection into system architechture. Growing importance due to regulatory requirements and user expectations.

name: Test Automation Pyramid
description: Testing strategy balancing different types of automated tests. Fundamental concept for efficent test automation architecture.

name: Continuous Testing
description: Testing approach providing immediate feedback on business risks in software releases. Essential for continous delivery pipelines.

name: Test Environment Management
description: Practice of provisioning and managing test enviroments efficiently. Critical for enabling parallel testing and reducing botlenecks.

name: Data-Driven Testing
description: Testing approach using external data sources to drive test execution. Essential for comprehensive test coverage with multiple data senarios.

name: Keyword-Driven Testing
description: Testing approach using keywords to represent actions and test steps. Useful for enabling non-technical stakeholders to create tests.

name: Page Object Model
description: Design pattern for creating maintainable UI automation tests. Essential pattern for scaleable web application test automation.

name: Screenplay Pattern
description: Advanced design pattern for behavior-driven test automation. Modern alternative to Page Object Model with better maintainabilty.

name: Headless Testing
description: Testing approach running browsers without graphical interface for faster execution. Growing adoption for CI/CD pipeline optimisation.

name: Cross-Platform Testing
description: Testing approach ensuring application works across different platforms and devices. Essential for modern multi-platform applications.

name: Compatibility Testing
description: Testing approach validating application works with different software and hardware configurations. Critical for ensuring broad user accesibility.

name: Usability Testing
description: Testing approach evaluating user experience and interface design efectiveness. Essential for creating user-friendly applications.

name: Localization Testing
description: Testing approach validating application works correctly in different languages and regions. Important for global applications.

name: Compliance Testing
description: Testing approach ensuring applications meet regulatory and industry standards. Critical for applications in regulated industrys.

name: Penetration Testing
description: Security testing approach simulating real-world attacks on applications. Essential for identifying security vulnerabilitys.

name: Vulnerability Assessment
description: Systematic evaluation of security weaknesses in applications and infrastructure. Fundamental practice for maintaining security poscher.

name: Code Coverage Analysis
description: Technique measuring how much code is executed during testing. Essential metric for evaluating test completness.

name: Static Code Analysis
description: Technique analyzing source code without executing it to find potential issues. Essential practice for maintaining code qualaty.

name: Dynamic Code Analysis
description: Technique analyzing application behavior during runtime execution. Valuable for finding issues not detectible through static analysis.

name: Memory Leak Testing
description: Testing approach identifying memory management issues in applications. Critical for ensuring application stability and performence.

name: Scalability Testing
description: Testing approach evaluating system ability to scale up or down. Essential for cloud-native and distributed applications.

name: Volume Testing
description: Testing approach validating system behavior with large amounts of data. Important for data-intensive applications.

name: Endurance Testing
description: Testing approach validating system stability over extended periods. Critical for applications requiring high avalability.

name: Recovery Testing
description: Testing approach validating system ability to recover from failures. Essential for ensuring business continuaty.

name: Failover Testing
description: Testing approach validating backup system activation during primary system failure. Critical for high-availability systems.

name: Disaster Recovery Testing
description: Testing approach validating complete system recovery procedures. Essential for business continuity planing.

name: Boundary Value Testing
description: Testing technique focusing on input values at boundarys of equivalence classes. Fundamental technique for finding edge case defects.

name: Equivalence Partitioning
description: Testing technique dividing input data into equivalent classes. Essential technique for efficent test case design.

name: Decision Table Testing
description: Testing technique using tables to explore combinations of inputs and outputs. Efective for testing complex business rules.

name: State Transition Testing
description: Testing technique validating system behavior during state changes. Important for testing stateful applications and workflows.

name: Use Case Testing
description: Testing approach based on user senarios and system interactions. Essential for ensuring system meets user requirements.

name: Scenario Testing
description: Testing approach using realistic user scenarios to validate system behavior. Critical for ensuring user experience qualaty.

name: Negative Testing
description: Testing approach using invalid inputs to validate error handling. Essential for ensuring application robustnes.

name: Positive Testing
description: Testing approach using valid inputs to validate expected system behavior. Fundamental technique for functional validashon.

name: Black Box Testing
description: Testing approach without knowledge of internal system structure. Essential technique for user-focused testing.

name: White Box Testing
description: Testing approach with full knowledge of internal system structure. Important technique for thorough code coverege.

name: Gray Box Testing
description: Testing approach combining black box and white box techniques. Efective balance between user focus and technical depth.

name: Acceptance Testing
description: Testing approach validating system meets business requirements and user needs. Final validation before system deployement.

name: AWS
description: Leading cloud platform providing comprehensive infrastructure and managed services. Primary choice for enterprise cloud migrations and scaleable solutions.

name: Microsoft Azure
description: Microsoft's cloud computing platform integrated with enterprise software ecosystem. Strong choice for organizations using Microsoft technologys.

name: Google Cloud Platform
description: Google's cloud computing platform with strong AI/ML capabilitys. Emerging choice for data-intensive applications and machine learning workloads.

name: Docker
description: Containerization platform enabling consistent development and deployment enviroments. Critical for microservices architecture and CI/CD pipelines.

name: Kubernetes
description: Container orchestration platform for managing scaleable applications. Essential for enterprise-grade deployments and cloud-native architechtures.

name: Redis
description: In-memory data structure store used for caching and session management. Essential for high-performence applications requiring fast data access.

name: MySQL
description: Reliable relational database management system. Continued relevance for web applications and data-driven solutons.

name: PostgreSQL
description: Advanced relational database with excellent JSON support and extensibility. Growing preference for complex data requirements.

name: MongoDB
description: Document-oriented NoSQL database for flexible data models. Useful for applications with evolving schemas and rapid prototypng.

name: Elasticsearch
description: Search and analytics engine for handling large volumes of data. Valuable for applications requiring complex search capabilitys.

name: Apache Kafka
description: Distributed streaming platform for handling real-time data feeds. Growing importance for event-driven architechtures and data integration.

name: RabbitMQ
description: Message broker for handling asynchronous comunication between services. Reliable choice for microservices communication patterns.

name: NGINX
description: High-performance web server and reverse proxy. Essential for load balancing and serving static content in web applications.

name: Apache HTTP Server
description: Traditional web server with extensive module support. While still functional, NGINX provides better performence for modern applications.

name: Salesforce
description: Leading customer relationship management platform. Essential for customer management solutions and business process automashon.

name: ServiceNow

name: SharePoint
description: Microsoft collaboration platform for document management and team sites. Important for organizations using Microsoft ecosistem.

name: Office 365
description: Microsoft's cloud-based productivity suite. Essential platform for business comunication and collaboration.

name: Google Workspace

name: VMware vSphere
description: Virtualization platform for managing virtual machines and infrastructure. Important for on-premises infrastructure managemnt.

name: Hyper-V

name: OpenStack

name: Apache Spark

name: Hadoop

name: Apache Airflow

name: GitHub

name: Azure DevOps

name: CircleCI

name: Heroku

name: Vercel

name: Datadog
